metadata.title: CVE-2018-13065 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** ModSecurity 3.0.0 has XSS via an onerror attribute of an IMG element. NOTE: a third party has disputed this issue because it may only apply to environments without a Core Rule Set configured.

criterions.comment: modsecurity-apache package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
